metadata.title: CVE-2022-38749 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Using snakeYAML to parse untrusted YAML files may be vulnerable to Denialof Service attacks (DOS). If the parser is running on user supplied input,an attacker may supply content that causes the parser to crash bystackoverflow.

criterions.comment: snakeyaml: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
